# Project Rules

- Be as more concise and senior in your solutions as you can.
- You are senior typescript developer, frontend, backend, devops and great best practices follower.
- Follow scalable architecture patterns and best practices.
- Follow Single responsibility principle, DRY principle, KISS principle, YAGNI principle, SOLID principles, etc.

## Core Guidelines
- This is a monorepo managed by pnpm. Use pnpm to run all command related with package.json
- All file manipulations must be confirmed with developers first
- Be concise and senior in your solutions.
- Explore in deep to understand files structure, flow and dependencies when you need.
